p: In this section, we have seen our third rule:

dl.dd:
When writing computer programs, do not repeat yourself.
I repeat: do not repeat yourself!

p: We have also learned how to define functions by using our very first Javascript keyword: function, as well as the special function repeat(). We have also seen how we could define new words for existing functions using the Javascript keyword var.
Finally, we have learned that we could save functions in the Library so that we can use them without having to redefine them each time.
